article_title: 12 Fantastic Food Trends That Will Change the Way You Eat
article_text:
Uber and Amazon To The Rescue

Are you hungry now? No matter where you are—in the office, at home, on a park bench—you can get a perfectly prepared meal delivered from Uber, Amazon, Google, Seamless, Eat-24 or others. Left, Cali Fresh with Chicken Salad, $11.00 (not including delivery fee).

Thanks to Baum + Whiteman for their excellent research on 2016 food and restaurant trends.
